name: Scootix
description:
GMTK gamejam project, made by 3 game developers/designers

Goal : Reach the end of the levels, dodging scootix, and using lures.

Playground using the theme roll the dices, with two dices on the bottom changing each 3 turns the way you play

Puzzle/Strategie game

Left Mouse : Move Player

 Rigth Mouse : Create Lure 

Pan : Move camera 

Scroll Down/UP : zoom In/Out

Have fun !

Credits:

Yoann Pierkot

Philémon Morel

Jacques Cavaillac
